LanguageData.Alien_Nova.label: 诺瓦
LanguageData.Alien_Nova.description: 诺瓦人是一种类人生物，他们的原生星球温度低于冰点。他们能很好的适应寒冷天气，因为他们的身体对于寒冷有较好的抗性。而且，他们比一般的人类速度要快。
LanguageData.Alien_Nova.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Nova.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Nova.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.label: 奥瑞森
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.description: 原生的奥瑞森人是一种人型猫科动物，他们是正常进化到现在的状态，而且在非奥瑞森的原生星球，他们也能很好的适应并生存下来！
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.tools.0.label: teeth
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.tools.1.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.tools.2.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.tools.3.label: tail
LanguageData.Alien_Orassan.tools.4.label: head
LanguageData.Alien_Asari.label: 阿萨利
LanguageData.Alien_Asari.description: A mono-gender race, the asari are distinctly feminine in appearance and possess maternal instincts. Their unique physiology, expressed in a millennium-long lifespan and the ability to reproduce with a partner of any gender or species, gives them a conservative yet convivial attitude toward other races.
LanguageData.Alien_Asari.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.Alien_Asari.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.Alien_Asari.tools.2.label: head
